Heres a new thread for language creation. Here's what I have so far, please make changes and rules as you go. Most ideas are good ideas! Try tweaking rules  to make dialects, who knows what will happen?

This is what I have made so far:

Rules: U, O, and A are the only vowels. A T will always fallow an A. A U will follow a U. Gat is the prefix of a celestial body. Y does not exist anywhere in this language. If a word ends with a vowel, the letter F will follow. Numbers aredesignated by a vowel and a dash.

 

Datnguur: Threat

Fuullat: Friend

Wuutoat: Water

Huumon: Human

Celestial Bodies:

Gatuuat: Earth

Gatsatl: Sol

GatMatuuf: Mars

Gatbuulatnof: Bellona
